Plot: After a botched mission in Cuba, professional mercenary Shale and his crew Joey Six, Hollan, Rem, and Wellman head home to Miami, Florida, where Shale is reunited with his fiance Jane ...
Title: The Substitute
Writer: Roy Frumkes, Rocco Simonelli, Alan Ormsby
Actors: Tom Berenger, Raymond Cruz, William Forsythe, Luis Guzmán
